summary: Regretfully, this mod has been abandoned. It may still work but is still quite buggy and no longer being updated. However, thanks to the efforts of various survival and realism mod authors, it's also no longer significant!
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=red][size=3]Regretfully, this mod has been abandoned. It may still work but is still quite buggy and no longer being updated.[/size][/color][/b]
However, thanks to the efforts of various survival and realism mod authors, it's also no longer significant!

If you're a fan of camping in Skyrim, I recommend hunting around for an alternative mod. I, personally, use P[b]erseid9's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26228/?]Realistic Needs and Diseases[/url][/b]. It keeps what it does simple, and I like that sort of thing, and includes its own small assortment of camping gear.


[b][size=3][u]F.A.Q:[/u][/size][/b]
[b]Q: I have a suggestion for your mod, would you like to hear it?[/b]
[i][color=lightgrey]A: No. Sorry, but I am no longer updating this mod. I do encourage, however, that you look into creating a mod with that feature yourself. Modding can be a lot of fun and every mod starts from just one idea.[/color][/i]

[b]Q: I am experiencing a bug with your mod. Can you fix it for me?[/b]
[color=lightgrey][i]A: No. Sorry, but I have been away from this project so long that I am unfamiliar with its workings and have no idea what could be causing you problems. The best advice I can offer is to stop using it and look for a less buggy alternative.[/i][/color]

[b]Q: Your mod broke my save game! What do you plan on doing about it?[/b]
[color=lightgrey][i]A: Nothing. You chose to install this mod. If you didn't make back-ups, that's your bad. I don't believe your data is my responsibility and doubt I could do anything about corruption even if I did.[/i][/color]

[b]Q: Can I make and upload a translated version of your mod?[/b]
[color=lightgrey][i]A: No. This mod has been abandoned. I would rather it wasn't spread to other languages.[/i][/color]

[b]Q: Why did you stop modding? Will you ever come back?[/b]
[color=lightgrey][i]A: I stopped playing Skyrim. And I am already back, but I am working on other smaller projects and have no intention of returning to this one.[/i][/color]


If you have any other questions, feel free to message me on the nexus forums. If I have not got back to you yet, please be patient. I don't visit here every day.

[right]~LtMattmoo[/right]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=grey]This plugin introduces Dovahkiin to the wonders of sleeping under the stars by adding camping gear to Skyrim's general goods stores. Every major general store in Skyrim, as well as a few trade caravans, will now occasionally stock these items which include a tent, an Imperial tent, a tinderbox, a cooking pot and a mortar and pestle. In addition, camping gear can also be crafted.

The features of this plugin consist primarily of, but are not limitted to, new items which can be either bought at a general goods store or crafted. These features are detailed in the README which you can find among the links below.

README: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/readmes/Camping_readme.txt]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/readmes/Camping_readme.txt[/url]
Steam Workshop: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=12454]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=12454[/url]
Spanish Translation: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11467]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11467[/url]
Polish Translation: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11973]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11973[/url]
Czech translation: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13882]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13882[/url]

If you're a fan of realism/survival plugins then I would like to recommend to you the following, which are compatible with Camping.
Nitor's Hypothermia: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6745]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6745[/url]
Chesko's Frostfall: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11163]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11163[/url]
ManSh00ter's Basic Needs: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10843]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10843[/url]
Imp's More Complex Needs: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10639]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10639[/url][/color]
author: LtMattmoo

files.name: Camping v2-4-0
files.changelogHtml:
Added Firewood to general stores.
Reworked Wood Gathering.
Made compatibile with Nitor\'s Hypothermia.
Campfires can now use any flamable object for fuel.

files.name: Camping v2-4-1
files.changelogHtml:
Bugfix: Chopping Block insists that it\'s already in use.
Changed \"Sit\" to \"Use\" on all relevant Camping objects.
Added wood gathering sounds.
Added Camping Chair and Camping Stool.

files.name: Camping v2-4-2
files.changelogHtml:
Bugfix: Spamming the activate key duplicates objects being disassembled.
Bugfix: The player gets trapped inside Imperial Tents that they pitch.
Bugfix: Bedrolls get left behind after striking.

files.name: Camping v2-5-0
files.changelogHtml:
Wood Gathering reworked. You can now harvest Firewood from trees.
Wood Chopping Block removed.
Bugfix: Campfire lights persist after their Campfires degrade.
Reduced Firewood required for lighting a new Campfire to 6.

files.name: Camping v2-5-1
files.changelogHtml:
Bugfix: Wood Gathering only generates \"Woodcutting Attempt\".
Reduce Mortar and Pestle penalty from 35% to 25%.

files.name: Camping
files.changelogHtml:
Added portable Storage Sacks.
Storage Sacks are now required for crafting tents.
Increased Ingot requirement in the Cooking Pot recipe to conform with Val\'s Crafting Meltdown.
